remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将和事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the and events. 该示例需要两个都添加到窗体控件并将其连接到`addControl_Click`和`removeControl_Click`事件处理方法。The example requires that two controls are added to the form and connected to the `addControl_Click` and `removeControl_Click` event handling methods.
